strategy_reasoning: Translating technical model updates into 'new gear/loot' fits the retro gaming aesthetic perfectly. Using a flowing river metaphor for the scroll/gateway fixes communicates stability without boring technical jargon. The inventory screen reinforces the 'collection' of tools available.
visual_style: Cozy 8-bit pixel art with chunky sprites, warm lighting, and soft pastel gradients anchored by the signature lime green (#ecf874).

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute chubby bee mascot (round yellow body, brown stripes, pink blush) holding a tiny pixel movie clapperboard and a vintage microphone. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and peach pastel gradient background. Floating pixel icons of musical notes and film reels surrounding the bee. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'NEW GEAR'. Emotionally warm, nostalgic.
images.description: Announcing the new Audio (ElevenLabs) and Video (Grok/Imagen) capabilities as new creative tools.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute chubby bee mascot floating peacefully on a large green leaf down a gentle pastel blue pixel river. Soft lime green (#ecf874) sparkles in the air and lush pixel vegetation on the banks. Represents smooth scrolling and stability. Warm lighting, calm vibes like A Short Hike. No text. Serene and beautiful.
images.description: Visualizing the 'smooth scroll' and gateway fixes as a peaceful, uninterrupted flow state.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit game inventory screen UI. The cute chubby bee mascot is standing next to grid slots filled with glowing magical orbs (representing the new models). Background is soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient. Pixel font text at top: 'LEVEL UP'. Cozy, nostalgic gaming vibes, warm atmosphere, clean UI lines.
images.description: Showing the expansion of the platform's capabilities as leveling up an inventory.
